title: Champion Sports Break Away Base Set with Quick Release Plates and Stanchion Pan - 3 Pack - Official Little League Break Away Base Set
features: LITTLE LEAGUE BASE: 15" x 15" x 3" - Official little league base is perfect for any recreational baseball diamond
BREAK AWAY FEATURE: Quick release double first base disengages from stationary rubber base plate upon impact
INTERCHANGEABLE PLATES: 3 interchangeable plates to adjust holding strength of the base to the stanchion pan
METAL BASE PAN: Innovative anchor system is a stanchion pan and ground inserts to lock base into place
HEAVY DUTY CONSTRUCTION: Quality molded rubber base cover to stand up to the wear and tear of impact
description: BREAKAWAY SAFETY FEATURE  Safer than traditional locked bases, the Champion Sports Breakaway Base Set is designed to release upon side impact to ensure the safety of players as they slide into the bases. The base toppers easily fit into the anchored plate and feature a quick release that allows them to disengage from the stationary rubber base on impact.   LITTLE LEAGUE  Measuring 15 inches x 15 inches x 3 inches, the Champion Sports Breakaway Base Set is official size for use in Little League or recreational play. Our breakaway plates are also fully compliant with Little League Rule 1.06.   SET OF 3  Includes 3 rubber stationary plates and 3 interchangeable plate toppers for quick and easy set up of any standard diamond. Whether youâ€™re playing softball with a church league or coaching a Little League team, these bases are a great way to keep players safe during both vigorous and laid back play.   STEEL ANCHORS  This base set features steel anchors that easily install into any standard baseball diamond, making it perfect for Little League or recreational play. Easy installation means you can start your game that much faster.   HEAVY DUTY CONSTRUCTION  The one-piece construction, stationery, rubber base is made of quality molded rubber that can stand up to the wear and tear of repeated impact. Use these bases season after season for safe play.   - Set of 3 bases  15 inches x 15 inches x 2 inches  - White
